q1: Will Barcelona win the Champions League title in the next season?
a1: Barcelona have a good chance to win.
q2: How long will Lionel Messi play for FC Barcelona?
q3: What year do you think he will retire?
q4: I would guess sooner than that. Maybe he plays in the MLS.
a4: Barcelona have a clear path to the Title without Ronaldo.
q5: DO you think now without Ronaldo in the liga, Messi will play with the same intensity with Barcelona?
a5: I think his intensity of play will suffer.
